item.title: 爱立信计划在瑞典裁员1600人以推进成本削减计划
item.description: 爱立信公司计划裁减约1600个岗位，这家瑞典网络设备供应商正致力于降低运营成本。【原文：Ericsson AB plans to cut about 1,600 jobs, as the Swedish network equipment supplier looks to reduce its operational costs.】

item.title: 伦敦金融交易所集团启动全新数字结算平台，加速推进区块链应用
item.description: 伦敦证券交易所集团已推出一项支持区块链的新型数字结算服务，该交易所运营商正深化对支撑加密货币技术的应用。【原文：The London Stock Exchange Group Plc has launched a new blockchain-friendly digital settlement service, as the bourse operator deepens its use of the technology underpinning cryptocurrencies.】

item.title: 香港法院下令中国建筑商景瑞清盘
item.description: 香港高等法院下令清盘开发商景瑞控股有限公司，成为中国持续多年的房地产危机中，最新一家在该市被清盘的中国违约建筑商。【原文：Hong Kong’s High Court ordered the liquidation of developer Jingrui Holdings Ltd., making it the latest defaulted Chinese builder to be wound up in the city amid China’s years-long property crisis.】

item.title: 吉姆·拉特克利夫削减法国足球俱乐部尼斯的收购价格
item.description: 据知情人士透露，亿万富翁吉姆·拉特克利夫已大幅下调法国足球俱乐部尼斯队的要价。【原文：Billionaire Jim Ratcliffe has slashed the asking price for French football team OGC Nice, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 泰勒温佩公司认为英国房屋销售旺季需求“疲软”
item.description: 泰勒温佩公司表示，英国住房市场持续受困于疲软需求，购房者因抵押贷款成本高企而陷入困境，这已严重削弱了购房能力。【原文：The UK housing marked continues to be blighted by lackluster demand as buyers struggle with elevated mortgage costs that have stretched affordability, according to Taylor Wimpey Plc.】

item.title: 中国人民银行下调结构性利率以促进定向贷款
item.description: 中国央行将下调结构性货币政策工具利率0.25个百分点，在2026年伊始加大对经济的定向支持力度。【原文：China’s central bank will lower interest rates on its structural monetary policy tools by 0.25 percentage points, stepping up targeted support for the economy as it enters 2026.】

item.title: 微软因许可费问题遭瑞士监管机构调查
item.description: 瑞士竞争委员会已针对微软公司在该国向客户收取的许可费展开初步调查，此前该机构收到关于近期价格上涨的投诉。【原文：Switzerland’s competition commission has begun a preliminary investigation into Microsoft Corp. over the licensing fees it charges clients in the country after receiving complaints over recent price increases.】

item.title: 裕信银行驳斥蒙特帕斯基收购传闻为"毫无根据"
item.description: 裕信银行表示，近期媒体关于其有意收购竞争对手西恩纳蒙特帕斯基银行股份的报道“毫无根据”。【原文：UniCredit SpA said that recent media reports about its interest in potentially buying a stake in rival Banca Monte dei Paschi di Siena SpA were “unjustified.”】

item.title: 中国抢先布局人工智能应用：从汽车到鸟浴池无所不包
item.description: 在本月拉斯维加斯消费电子展（CES）的主题演讲和产品发布活动中，这场电子产品盛会传递出一个重要的地缘政治信号：中国企业正将人工智能快速嵌入到日益扩大的现实产品领域，使华盛顿与北京之间的人工智能竞争从聊天机器人和图像生成器领域，延伸至机器人、汽车和消费品领域。【原文：Amid the keynote speeches and product unveilings at CES this month, the Las Vegas electronics trade show delivered an important geopolitical message: Chinese companies are rapidly embedding artificial intelligence into a sprawling range of real-world products, taking the AI rivalry between Washington and Beijing from chatbots and image generators into the realm of robots, automobiles and consumer products.】

item.title: TikTok禁止泰国政客在选举前投放付费广告
item.description: 社交媒体平台TikTok表示，将在泰国选举期间禁止候选人付费投放广告或通过内容获利。【原文：Social media platform TikTok said it would block Thai election candidates from paying for advertising or monetizing their content during the election campaign period.】

item.title: 中国新增贷款降至七年最低水平，需求疲软
item.description: 去年中国银行新增贷款规模创2018年以来最低，12月信贷扩张放缓，这反映出借款人需求疲软正拖累经济增长。【原文：Chinese banks extended the smallest amount of new loans since 2018 last year while credit expansion slowed in December, in a reflection of sluggish demand from borrowers that’s weighing on growth.】

item.title: 菲律宾免签中国游客以提振旅游业
item.description: 菲律宾将允许中国公民免签入境，停留期限最长为两周。作为东南亚国家，菲律宾正努力振兴其陷入困境的旅游业。【原文：The Philippines will allow Chinese nationals to enter without visas for a stay of up to two weeks, as the Southeast Asian nation pushes to revive its faltering tourism sector.】

item.title: 英国经济11月反弹，捷豹网络攻击事件影响减弱
item.description: 在捷豹路虎遭受网络攻击后，英国工业生产出现复苏，推动经济增长达到五个月高点，此时正值财政大臣瑞秋·里夫斯即将公布预算案之际。【原文：A recovery in industrial production following the Jaguar Land Rover cyberattack drove UK growth to a five-month high in the run-up to Chancellor of the Exchequer Rachel Reeves’ budget.】

item.title: 英国11月经济增速超预期
韩国将Naver和NCSoft公司排除在激烈的主权人工智能竞赛之外
item.description: 韩国将由Naver公司和NCSoft公司牵头的团队排除在其备受瞩目的国家主权人工智能模型开发竞赛之外，参赛队伍由此缩减至三支。【原文：South Korea dropped teams led by units of Naver Corp. and NCSoft Corp. from its closely-watched competition to develop the nation’s first sovereign AI model, narrowing the field to three teams.】

item.title: 印度与俄罗斯的石油贸易可能再度下滑，导致船只滞留海上
item.description: 印度本月从俄罗斯进口原油的规模可能趋稳甚至下降，这将导致更多来自该OPEC+产油国的原油滞销，迫使这个全球第三大原油进口国寻求价格更高的替代品。【原文：India’s buying of Russian crude is likely to stabilize or even decline this month, leaving more cargoes from the OPEC+ producer stranded and pushing the world’s third-largest oil importer to look to pricier alternatives.】

item.title: 卡地亚母公司历峰集团假日季度销售额超预期
item.description: 历峰集团去年末几个月的销售额跃升至历史新高，假日购物者对其腕表和卡地亚珠宝的消费大幅增长，其中美国和中东地区的需求尤为强劲。【原文：Richemont sales jumped to a record in the final months of last year as holiday shoppers splurged on its watches and Cartier jewelry, led by demand in the US and the Middle East.】

item.title: 中国钢铁工业协会就禁运力拓铁矿石库存问题征询钢厂意见
item.description: 中国国有铁矿石贸易商正核查部分钢铁厂在中国港口持有的金伯利巴矿石库存，这表明必和必拓开采的铁矿石限制措施可能部分解除。【原文：China’s state-owned iron ore trader is checking on Jimblebar stockpiles held by some steel mills at Chinese ports, a sign that restrictions on the ore mined by BHP Group could be partially lifted.】

item.title: 台积电利润超预期，人工智能需求强劲再现
item.description: 台湾积体电路制造股份有限公司（TSMC）以强劲的利润增长超出预期，这印证了美国芯片设计公司对人工智能硬件需求的乐观预期。【原文：Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co. surpassed expectations with strong profit growth, supporting bullish indications from US chip designers about AI hardware demand.】

item.title: 印尼央行加入全球央行阵营支持美联储主席鲍威尔
item.description: 印度尼西亚央行加入全球央行阵营，公开支持美联储主席杰罗姆·鲍威尔，成为东南亚首个公开表态支持的美联储主席的货币当局。【原文：Bank Indonesia joined a group of global central banks in throwing its support behind Federal Reserve Chairman Jerome Powell, becoming the first monetary authority in Southeast Asia to publicly do so.】

item.title: LIV高尔夫在与PGA巡回赛的50亿美元较量中节节败退
item.description: 由沙特支持的LIV高尔夫有限公司举办的首届赛事，于三年前半在伦敦北部某乡村俱乐部开杆。冠军将获得475万美元奖金，创职业高尔夫赛事最高奖金纪录。交通标志警示着大批球迷将堵塞道路。【原文：The first tournament from Saudi-backed LIV Golf Ltd. teed off more than three and a half years ago at a country club in North London. The winner would bank $4.75 million, the largest payday in pro golf history. Traffic signs warned of throngs of fans clogging the roads.】

item.title: 美国高校国际学生人数多年后首次下降
item.description: 在特朗普政府收紧移民政策并针对多所顶尖学府采取行动后，今年秋季美国高校的外国学生入学人数出现三年来首次下滑。【原文：Foreign student enrollment at US universities fell this fall for the first time in three years after the Trump administration clamped down on immigration and took aim at a bevy of elite schools.】

item.title: 新兴市场支付服务商Dlocal计划进军亚洲市场
item.description: 支付服务提供商DLocal Ltd今年正深化其在亚洲主要市场的业务布局，计划招聘数十名员工，包括一名高级管理人员。该公司首席执行官佩德罗·阿恩特在接受采访时透露了这一计划。【原文：Payment services provider DLocal Ltd is deepening its presence this year in key Asian markets where it operates with a plan to make dozens of hires, including a senior figure, Chief Executive Officer Pedro Arnt said in an interview.】

item.title: 赞比亚领跑非洲股市反弹，其股票在全球排名第二
item.description: 赞比亚股市今年成为全球表现最佳的两大股市之一，这得益于铜价创下历史新高以及经济增长加速的预期。【原文：Zambia’s stock market is one of the world’s top two performers this year, powered by record high copper prices and expectations of faster economic growth.】

item.title: 2025年上半年英国非法体育流媒体观看量激增33%
item.description: 英国非法体育直播正呈激增态势，其背后推手是大量依靠无牌照博彩运营商广告资助的网站。球迷们为规避正规平台不断上涨的订阅费用，纷纷转向这些非法渠道。【原文：Illegal sports streaming is surging in the UK, fueled by sites that are largely funded by advertising from unlicensed gambling operators, as fans seek to dodge rising subscription costs on legitimate platforms.】

item.title: 中国对保证金交易的审查瞄准科技股推高股市泡沫
item.description: 中国意外收紧融资融券业务，凸显出监管机构在抑制市场泡沫的同时，仍需支持对创新科技企业的投资，这种平衡举措面临的挑战。【原文：China’s unexpected tightening of margin financing highlights the balancing act regulators face in curbing market froth while still supporting investment in its innovative technology firms.】

item.title: 莫桑比克总统称该国将在新国际货币基金组织计划后启动债务谈判
item.description: 莫桑比克总统丹尼尔·查波表示，该国将在与国际货币基金组织就新计划达成协议后，才开始与债权人进行债务重组谈判。【原文：Mozambique will only start talks with creditors to renegotiate its debt after reaching an agreement on a new program with the International Monetary Fund, President Daniel Chapo said.】

item.title: 新加坡住宅销售创多年新高，尽管近期有所放缓
item.description: 2025年新加坡新房销售量创下数年新高，即便在假期期间交易量有所降温的情况下依然如此。【原文：Singapore new home sales reached their highest level in years in 2025, even after transactions cooled during the holiday season.】

item.title: 油轮运费飙升，美国对委内瑞拉施压重塑石油运输格局
item.description: 华盛顿对委内瑞拉的干预正引发航运市场剧变，随着更多石油可能出口至美国的前景浮现，该地区油轮运费已攀升至近两年来的最高水平。【原文：The shipping market is being shaken up by Washington’s intervention in Venezuela, as the prospect of more oil being exported to the US boosts regional tanker rates to their highest level in almost two years.】

item.title: 特朗普暂缓制裁，伊朗石油风险未消
item.description:
该国给地缘政治格局带来的威胁远比委内瑞拉更甚。【原文：

The country is bringing far more danger to the geopolitical table than Venezuela.

】
